title: Craig Smith - Adam Smith and the Limits of Philosophy
description: This lecture was delivered at the University of St Andrews on 23 March 2022 and subsequently at George Mason University, where it was recorded. For a video of this lecture with the powerpoint slides, please vist:
content:encoded: This lecture was delivered at the University of St Andrews on 23 March 2022 and subsequently at George Mason University, where it was recorded. For a video of this lecture with the powerpoint slides, please vist:
itunes:subtitle: Why the Impartial Spectator is not a philosopher,  nor should we wish him to be
